name: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

descriptions.name: Cyclone
descriptions.description: Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.Range: 575Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

notes: Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
